title: 1 BR 1 BA 834 SqFt -Luxe + New Kitchens!
posting_body: Want more information on this unit?
This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 834 Sq.
Located in the heart of Henderson, Cyan At Green Valley offers you the extraordinary lifestyle that you've been searching for.
Our community features an array of advantages, including a relaxing swimming pool with sun deck, soothing jacuzzi, a 24-hour fitness center, and professional business center with internet access.
State-of the art fitness equipment available to create your own home gym.
Ask our leasing team about including The Mirror, TRX Suspension straps, and weight bench in your apartment.
We're excited to show you around and help you see why Cyan at Green Valley is the place you've been looking for.
Breed restrictions, deposits and fees may apply.
